p: Answer: Aedes albopictus is the main medium for DENV; The reference is not appropriate and has been changed to new article -“Guo X, Zhao T, Dong Y, Lu B. Survival and replication of dengue-2 virus in diapausing eggs of Aedes albopictus (Diptera: Culicidae). J Med Entomol. 2007;44(3):492-7. doi: 10.1603/0022-2585(2007)44[492:sarodv]2.0.co;2. PubMed PMID: 17547236.” The changed part is in the 363 lines of the manuscript.
